channel.title: INfinance
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INfinance, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: ‘He views me as an outsider’: My partner has cognitive decline. He made $750,000 in unnecessary expenses. How can I stop him from wiping us out?
item.description: “Some of these expenditures were along the lines of ‘Guess what I bought today?’ bad surprises.”

item.title: Gold Futures Rise Slightly as Market Awaits China Stimulus, U.S. Rate-Cut Clarity
item.description: Gold futures nudged higher, broadly holding ground as traders digested the Chinese government’s comments on the prospect of fiscal stimulus to prop up...

item.title: Boeing to lay off thousands of workers, warns of quarterly loss and weaker sales
item.description: Boeing surprised markets late Friday with news that it plans to cut about 10% of its workforce, and warned investors that it is looking at a much bigg...

item.title: Would a Time Machine Make You a Great Investor?
item.description: Traders who got a peek at dozens of real Wall Street Journal front pages mostly couldn’t make money. Here’s why.

item.title: Italy’s top bank fires clerk accused of accessing prime minister’s account info
item.description: Intesa Sanpaolo apologized for the breaches that allegedly saw a mid-level bank clerk access information linked to the accounts of thousands of high-p...

item.title: Dollar's Prospects Look Good
item.description: The DXY dollar index was stronger, and has scope to rise further due to both interest-rate prospects and risk aversion, Brown Brothers Harriman said.

item.title: The strange past of the real estate investor who bought Kanye West’s gutted Malibu mansion
item.description: The investor who purchased the Malibu home has come forward to share more details about his plans for it—and how his criminal past led him to get invo...

item.title: French Bonds Slightly Underperform Bunds After Fitch Lowers France's Outlook
item.description: OATs marginally underperform Bunds after Fitch Ratings lowered France’s outlook to negative, as the move was widely anticipated amid the country’s bud...

item.title: Oil Falls on Chinese Demand Concerns
item.description: Oil prices fell in early European trade on persistent concerns over the demand outlook in top crude importer China.

item.title: Why Lisa Marie Presley kept her son’s body in her home for 2 months after his death
item.description: In a newly released memoir, Elvis Presley’s late daughter posthumously reveals how she wanted to keep her child close while grieving.
